Paper.Title: Sentence Class-based HMM RoleTag-based Entity Recognition Class-based HMM Post-processing

Section.Paragraph: Chinese word segmentation is always much accounted of in ICT-NLP. In this bakeoff, two different systems in ICT-NLP participated. The one is SYSTEM_#1 evaluated in three tracks -- PK-close, MSR-close and MSR-open, and SYSTEM_#2 PK-open. Through this bakeoff , the development of Chinese segmentation is learned and the problems are found in our systems.
